metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15133 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In GIFLIB before 2019-02-16, a malformed GIF file triggers a divide-by-zeroexception in the decoder function DGifSlurp in dgif_lib.c if the heightfield of the ImageSize data structure is equal to zero.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15133` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

giflib-tools - 5.1.4-2ubuntu0.1
libgif7 - 5.1.4-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: giflib package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.4-2ubuntu0.1').
